name: Coke Maze (ayaka_xuan)
description: This is a 2D platformer game, a group project I worked on with my friends. The main character of the game is a coke-addicted guy. He becomes obsessed with Coke's sugar, carbonation, and coca (early Coke contained coca). He repeatedly drinks large amounts of Coke to escape his less-than-ideal reality, eventually creating hallucinations. Players must defeat the monster in the Coke hallucination maze by throwing bottles to find the exit.
